## Welcome to Windows Domains for Beginners!

# Teach Me Like I'm 10

## Understanding Windows Domains for Beginners

Think of Active Directory like a school's main office. It keeps track of all students (users), what classrooms they can enter (permissions), and what books they can check out (resources). Securing it means making sure only the right people can access the right things.
